message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $110. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you, and this price reflects its true value.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. I am willing to pay $95 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value, but I'm aiming for something closer to $105.  This product has unique features that I'm confident will be very valuable for you.
I see your point, Alice. Considering the unique features of the product, I am willing to pay $100 for it.
